headline: Visa, CVS, and 4 More Oversold Stocks Worth a Look Before Earnings

headline: CenterPoint: Q2 Earnings Snapshot
summary: HOUSTON (AP) — CenterPoint Energy Inc. CNP) on Thursday reported second-quarter earnings of $198 million. On a per-share basis, the Houston-based company said it had net income of 30 cents.

headline: CenterPoint Energy boosts ten-year capital plan by $500m
summary: In the second quarter of 2025, CenterPoint reported net income of $198m or $0.30 per diluted share.

headline: CenterPoint Energy building the workforce of the future to implement $53 billion in long-term investments to support Houston's growth and critical resiliency work
summary: As part of a continued commitment to building the most resilient coastal grid in the country, CenterPoint Energy is announcing a series of efforts to achieve its goal of hiring 200 additional lineworkers by the end of this year, and nearly 800 by 2030. CenterPoint's accelerated hiring efforts will support historic energy investments over the next 10 years and help the Greater Houston area meet the rapidly growing demand for local electric workers.
